0.000000	inside,
0.000000	Kalkalilh
0.000000	took
0.000000	the
0.000000	children
0.000000	from
0.000000	the
0.000000	basket
0.000000	one
0.000000	by
0.000000	one,
0.000000	and
0.000000	tied
0.000000	them
0.000000	up
0.000000	in
0.000000	a
0.000000	scary
0.000000	room
0.000000	filled
0.000000	with
0.000000	laughing
0.000000	skulls.
